  • Method Details

    • updateCurrentTransactionLimitCounter

      void updateCurrentTransactionLimitCounter (@NotNull @NotNull Shop shop, boolean isBuy, long amount)
      Updates the transaction limit counter for the shop.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to update.
      isBuy - Whether the transaction was buy or sell.
      amount - The amount to set.

    • getCurrentTransactionCounter

      long getCurrentTransactionCounter (Shop shop, boolean isBuy, boolean isGlobal)
      Gets the current transaction limit counter under the shop.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to check for.
      isBuy - Whether the transaction was buy or sell.
      isGlobal - Whether the limited needs to be global or player specific.
      Returns:
      The current counter for the shop.

    • hasMetTransactionLimit

      boolean hasMetTransactionLimit (Shop shop, boolean isBuy, boolean isGlobal)
      Checks if the transaction limit was reached.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to check against.
      isBuy - Whether the transaction was buy or sell.
      isGlobal - Whether the limited needs to be global or player specific.
      Returns:
      Whether the limit was met.

    • updateCooldown

      void updateCooldown (@NotNull @NotNull String cooldownId)
      Updates the cooldown id for the player.
      Parameters:
      cooldownId - The cooldown id to update.

    • isOnCooldown

      boolean isOnCooldown (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull String cooldownId, int cooldown)
      Checks if the passed player has a cooldown at the specified id based on the base cooldown value.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      cooldownId - The cooldown id.
      cooldown - The cooldown's amount (normally the configuration value).
      Returns:
      Whether the cooldown is active (above zero).

    • getCooldown

      int getCooldown (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull String cooldownId, int cooldown)
      Gets the cooldown left for the player at a specified id.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to get the cooldown from.
      cooldownId - The cooldown id.
      cooldown - The cooldown value (Usually from configuration).
      Returns:
      The cooldown time remaining.

    • hasUnlockedBBM

      boolean hasUnlockedBBM (@NotNull @NotNull String unlockId)
      Checks to see if the player has purchased and unlocked the base block material.
      Parameters:
      unlockId - The material followed by a colon and its durability which is normally set to -1 or 0.
      Returns:
      Whether the appearance is unlocked.

    • unlockBaseBlock

      void unlockBaseBlock (@NotNull @NotNull String unlockId)
      Unlocks the base-block appearance.
      Parameters:
      unlockId - The material followed by a colon and the durability.

      Shop getSelectedShop()
      Gets the shop object the player is currently tethered to from editing or any similar actions.
      Returns:
      The shop object. (Returns NULL if there is no shop selected for editing or similar actions)

      Returns:

    • getLongTermInteractionValue

      Object getLongTermInteractionValue()
